I am feeling: a mix of excitement and nervousness
Describe your feelings: I am feeling a range of emotions as I navigate this unexpected pregnancy while also considering my future and the well-being of my existing child. There's excitement for the new life growing within me, but also nervousness about the uncertainties ahead.
Describe any symptoms: I have been feeling more tired than usual, experiencing some morning sickness, and my emotions have been all over the place. These symptoms are challenging but also a reminder of the changes happening in my body.
Highlights of the Week: Bonding with my boyfriend over our future, imagining life with a new baby, seeking support from loved ones
Highlight of the week: Having heartfelt conversations with my boyfriend about our options and future plans has brought us closer together. Imagining life with a new baby has also sparked moments of joy and anticipation. Additionally, reaching out to my close friends and family for support has helped me feel less alone in this journey.
My Goal: To make an informed decision about the pregnancy that aligns with my values and future plans
Your goal: My goal is to carefully consider all factors, seek guidance from trusted sources, and make a decision regarding this pregnancy that feels right for me and my family.
To Do List: Research options for prenatal care and support
Schedule a prenatal appointment to discuss my health and the pregnancy
Seek advice from a counselor or therapist to explore my feelings and concerns
Update my boyfriend on any medical updates or decisions
Notes: This week has been a rollercoaster of emotions and reflections. I am grateful for the support I have received so far and am hopeful that I will navigate this challenging period with grace and wisdom.
